name: Stalky
description:
Type of Game: Yuri (GxG), Romance, Slice of Life, Mystery

Length: Very short but intense

Language : English

Story: You're Yui, a homophobic Highschool girl, who is helping a young Middle Schooler girl Nao but after that, a lot of strange events happens...

Characters :

Yui: The main character, homophobic but very caring and Kins

Nao: A little bitch but with some unexpected innocence

Isato: Your pathetic Boyfriend

If you make a Youtube Video or something Stalky Related give me the link in comments

Follow me on Twitter for update: @Julie_Vinovel

Help me on ko-fi!

Good Game !
